Uses of Package
org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mqtt

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mqtt 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mqtt  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mqtt.reconnect  
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mqtt used by org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mqtt 
    Class and Description
    MqttActionCallback
    Implement this to be notified of the success or error of a any method in MqttBrokerConnection that takes a callback.
    MqttBrokerConnection
    An MQTTBrokerConnection represents a single client connection to a MQTT broker.
    MqttBrokerConnection.ConnectionCallback
    Create a listener object for being used as a callback for a connection attempt.
    MqttBrokerConnection.MqttVersion
    MQTT version (currently v3 and v5)
    MqttBrokerConnection.Protocol
    MQTT transport protocols
    MqttConnectionObserver
    Implement this interface to get notified of connection state changes.
    MqttConnectionState
    The connection state of a MqttBrokerConnection.
    MqttException
    Thrown if an error occurs communicating with the server.
    MqttMessageSubscriber
    Implement this interface and register on the MqttBrokerConnection to get notified of incoming Mqtt messages on the given topic.
    MqttServiceObserver
    Implement this interface to get notified of new and removed MQTT broker.
    MqttWillAndTestament
    Class encapsulating the last will and testament that is published after the client has gone offline.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mqtt used by org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.mqtt.reconnect 
    Class and Description
    MqttBrokerConnection
    An MQTTBrokerConnection represents a single client connection to a MQTT broker.
